question: Which among the following sentences is / are NOT correct ?
option1: The first amendment to the constitution was effected in 1951
option2: Originally Indian constitution had 22 parts, 395 articles and 8 schedules
option3: The first meeting of the constituent assembly was held on 9th December 1946
explanation: Originally Indian constitution had 22 parts, 395 articles and 8 schedules. The first meeting of the constituent assembly was held on 9th December 1946 and the first amendment to the constitution was made in 1951.
